title: 悲报，英国女王伊丽莎伯二世传宾天。。。
contents:
2 of my sources have told me that the news about the Queen having passed away is checking out to be true. We will know for sure tomorrow.

The Duchess however just posted a "prep" post on Facebook. Stand by folks..

#TheQueen #Royals #RoyalFamily #RoyalSuccession 

https://t.co/vE6hbDtZ7Z


别的不说了，让我们一起继续为长者集气，保佑虵健康平安！
